beautiful pictures more often automatic: Who says you can't have it all? The Kodak EASYSHARE Z980 digital camera blends the latest picture-taking technology with the ultimate in style. And with Kodak's innovative smart capture feature, it's the take-anywhere camera that does it all - automatically.
